description:
The summer heat is on!
Koizumi-san looks at the trio loudly suffering from the heat with disdain while she continues on her ramen pilgrimage. 
Yuu wills herself to follow her, and Koizumi-san declares that she will be having "hiyashi" ramen.
What exactly is this "hiyashi" ramen?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ramen du matin / Ramen froid / Musée
朝ラーメン / 冷やし / 博物館
